title: WTB: t206 - help me start my backs collection
author: AdamG

posts.post_title: WTB: t206 - help me start my backs collection
posts.post_content:
I'm looking for some backs to get started. I'd prefer ungraded with no (or minimal) back paper loss that would obstruct the brand name. Creasing and stains are generally ok... but prefer no trimming, writing, or scribbles. Front player, quality, grade, etc isn't important.

I'd also prefer to purchase several from one person to save on shipping, time, etc. Thanks for looking... let me know.

I'm interested in the following, not looking for any rare variations:

Old Mill (both Southern and Large Assortment)
Cycle
American Beauty
EPDG
Tolstoi
Hindu

I've got 'em all.

Shoot me an EMAIL - [url]scottglevy@Yahoo.com[/url] to discuss details.

Best Regards,
Scott
